description:
A cosy room featuring an unreasonably wide bed, sporting an ornate canopy. To its left is an oak drawer, with a perfectly polished mirror above it, and to its right is a door with a note on it. Written in a shaky hand, the note reads "I am done organizing your closet, it is a futile, time-wasting endeavor!"

You can return to the [[drawing room->loungeDungeonDrawingRoom]], or you can enter the [[closet->loungeDungeonClosetEntryway]].
